data.eml:eml: Revision of the southeast Asian soldier-fly genus Parastratiosphecomyia Brunetti, 1923 (Diptera, Stratiomyidae, Pachygastrinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Woodley, Norman E. (2012): Revision of the southeast Asian soldier-fly genus Parastratiosphecomyia Brunetti, 1923 (Diptera, Stratiomyidae, Pachygastrinae). ZooKeys 238: 1-21, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.238.3999, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.238.3999
